official_title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Eastport Harbor, Maine, navigation project.

summary.text: Terminates the authorization for the Eastport Harbor, Maine, navigation project. Requires the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to transfer title to any facilities and improvements constructed by the United States as part of such project without consideration to the city of Eastport.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Eastport Harbor, Maine, navigation project.
